titleStmt.title: The northern subscribers plea, vindicated from the exceptions laid against it by the non-subscribing ministers of Lancashire and Cheshire, and re-inforced by J. Drew. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Drew, John, fl. 1649-1651.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.I. to be sold by John Wright at the Kings head in the Old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings head in the Old Bayley
